::Spears::

She had a shocked look on her face. "Threat? You think of me as a 
threat?" She couldn't believe her audio sensors. She was starting to 
get mad at the thought of being considered a threat, when her trainer 
program took over.  Her body shook for a moment.  

She looked at Firearm.
"I'm not going into stasis lock. Now or ever. No thank you."  She 
started walking back the way she came.  




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Firearm::
> 
> Firearm nods, looking at Spears strangely. She was one weird bot...
> 
> "Cybertronian Fire," he says into his comm, "Prepare a stretcher, 
and 
> some scanning jams. We're bringing in a potential threat."
>
